mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ORDERPRODUCT (ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_PRODUCT_PRICE, ORDER_PRODUCT_COUNT, ORDER_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, PRODUCT_IMAGE) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{orderProductPrice}, #{orderProductCount}, #{orderProductDiscount}, #{productImage})
mapper.select: SELECT op.ORDER_ID FROM TBL_ORDERPRODUCT op JOIN tbl_orders o ON op.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID WHERE o.MEMBER_ID_NO = #{memberId} AND op.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
